What is the formula for calculating the mean of a set of numbers?
options: mean = sum of numbers / total number of numbers
mean = sum of numbers * total number of numbers
mean = sum of numbers + total number of numbers
mean = sum of numbers - total number of numbers
questions.answer: mean = sum of numbers / total number of numbers

questions.question: What is the formula for calculating the mode of a set of numbers?
options: mode = number that appears most frequently in the set
mode = sum of numbers / total number of numbers
mode = sum of numbers * total number of numbers
mode = sum of numbers + total number of numbers
questions.answer: mode = number that appears most frequently in the set

questions.question: What is the formula for calculating the median of a set of numbers?
options: median = middle number in the set when the set is arranged in ascending or descending order
median = sum of numbers / total number of numbers
median = sum of numbers * total number of numbers
median = sum of numbers + total number of numbers
questions.answer: median = middle number in the set when the set is arranged in ascending or descending order

questions.question: What is the formula for calculating the standard deviation of a set of numbers?
options: standard deviation = sqrt(sum of (each number - mean)^2 / total number of numbers)
standard deviation = sum of (each number - mean) / total number of numbers
standard deviation = sum of (each number - mean)^2 / total number of numbers
standard deviation = sqrt(sum of each number / total number of numbers)
questions.answer: standard deviation = sqrt(sum of (each number - mean)^2 / total number of numbers)
